com.nutiteq.ui
Class DefaultLabel

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.ui.Label
      com.nutiteq.ui.DefaultLabel

public class DefaultLabel
extends Label

Simple text-based map label containing title and optional description.

Constructor Summary

          Default constructor.

          Constructor for label with both title and description and description alignment style.

Constructor Detail

DefaultLabel

public DefaultLabel(java.lang.String title)
Default constructor.

Parameters:
title - label title.

DefaultLabel

public DefaultLabel(java.lang.String title,
                    java.lang.String description)
Constructor for label with both title and description. Description will be aligned to the center of the label.

Parameters:
title - label title.
description - label description. Description supports \n separator for multiline texts.

DefaultLabel

public DefaultLabel(java.lang.String title,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    android.graphics.Paint.Align descAlign)
Constructor for label with both title and description and description alignment style.

Parameters:
title - label title.
description - label description. Description supports \n separator for multiline texts.
descAlign - description alignment style.

DefaultLabel

public DefaultLabel(java.lang.String title,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    LabelStyle style)
Constructor for label with title, description and custom label style.

Parameters:
title - label title.
description - label description. Description supports \n separator for multiline texts.
style - label style.
